name: Tom'sReality
0:
”Alexa ask Tom's reality if it is hot”
”Alexa ask Tom's reality if it is cold”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tom's reality
des: My name is Tom. My reality is that my wife keeps my house really hot or cold. I can now prove to my wife that it is hot or cold with the third party validation of Amazon. Just ask 'Alexa, ask Tom's reality if it is hot (or cold),' and Alexa will verify my reality.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
